entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:39 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 12:49 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
